tv.amwa.maj.meta

Interface Root

  • All Superinterfaces:
    MetadataObject
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RootImpl

    public interface Root
extends MetadataObject

    Represents the logical association of the definitions of the extensions used in a file with the structural and descriptive metadata in the file.

    See Also:
    ExtensionScheme, Preface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods

      Add an extension scheme to the set of extension schemes used for this file.

      Determines if the root contains the given extension scheme, indicating that the scheme is used in the file.

    • Method Detail

      • getRootPreface

        Preface getRootPreface()

        Returns the preface of the file.

        Returns:
        Preface of the file.

      • setRootPreface

        void setRootPreface(Preface preface)
             throws NullPointerException

        Sets the preface of the file.

        Parameters:
        preface - Preface of the file.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot set the preface of the file using a null value.

      • getRootExtensions

        Set<ExtensionScheme> getRootExtensions()

        Returns the set of extension schemes that are used for this file. The extension schemes represent meta definitions that are not contained in the AAF baseline.

        Returns:
        Set of extension schemes that are used for this file.
        See Also:
        ApplicationPluginObject.getApplicationScheme(), DescriptiveMarker.getDescriptiveMetadataScheme(), InterchangeObject.getApplicationPlugins(), Preface.getDescriptiveSchemes()

      • addRootExtension

        void addRootExtension(ExtensionScheme extensionScheme)

        Add an extension scheme to the set of extension schemes used for this file.

        Parameters:
        extensionScheme - Extension scheme to add.
        See Also:
        getRootExtensions()

      • containsRootExtension

        boolean containsRootExtension(ExtensionScheme extensionScheme)
                       throws NullPointerException

        Determines if the root contains the given extension scheme, indicating that the scheme is used in the file.

        Parameters:
        extensionScheme - Extension scheme to check for.
        Returns:
        Is the given extension scheme contained in the root of the file?
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot check for a root using a null value.
        See Also:
        containsRootExtension(AUID), containsRootExtension(String), getRootExtensions()

      • containsRootExtension

        boolean containsRootExtension(AUID extensionSchemeID)
                       throws NullPointerException

        Determines if the root contains the given extension scheme identifier, indicating that the corresponding scheme is used in the file.

        Parameters:
        extensionScheme - Identifier for the extension scheme to check for.
        Returns:
        Is the identified extension scheme contained in the root of the file?
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot check for a root using a null value.
        See Also:
        containsRootExtension(ExtensionScheme), containsRootExtension(String), getRootExtensions(), ExtensionScheme.getSchemeID()

      • containsRootExtension

        boolean containsRootExtension(String schemeURI)
                       throws NullPointerException

        Determines if the root contains the given extension scheme from its scheme URI or preferred prefix, indicating that the corresponding scheme is used in the file.

        Parameters:
        schemeURI - Namespace URI or preferred prefix of the extension scheme to check for.
        Returns:
        Is the identified extension scheme contained in the root of the file?
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot check for a root using a null value.
        See Also:
        containsRootExtension(ExtensionScheme), containsRootExtension(AUID), getRootExtensions(), ExtensionScheme.getSchemeURI(), ExtensionScheme.getPreferredPrefix()

      • clearRootExtensions

        void clearRootExtensions()

        Clear all the root extension schemes for the file.

        See Also:
        getRootExtensions()

      • countRootExtensions

        int countRootExtensions()

        Returns the number of extension schemes attached to the file.

        Returns:
        Number of extension schemes attached to the file.
        See Also:
        getRootExtensions()

      • removeRootExtension

        boolean removeRootExtension(ExtensionScheme extensionScheme)
                     throws NullPointerException

        Remove the given extension scheme from the set of extension schemes of this file.

        Parameters:
        extensionScheme - Extension scheme to remove from this file.
        Returns:
        Has the extension scheme been successfully removed from this file? Returns false if the extension scheme was not contained.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot remove an extension scheme using a null value.
        See Also:
        removeRootExtension(AUID), getRootExtensions()

      • removeRootExtension

        boolean removeRootExtension(AUID extensionScheme)
                     throws NullPointerException

        Remove the identified extension scheme from the set of extension schemes of this file.

        Parameters:
        extensionScheme - Identifier for the extension scheme to remove from this file.
        Returns:
        Has the extension scheme been successfully removed from this file? Returns false if the extension scheme was not contained.
        Throws:
        NullPointerException - Cannot remove an extension scheme using a null value.
        See Also:
        removeRootExtension(ExtensionScheme), getRootExtensions()

      • getRootFormatVersion

        @UInt32
int getRootFormatVersion()
                          throws PropertyNotPresentException

        Returns the simple integer version number of meta model. If present, this optional property shall be 12h or greater.

        Returns:
        Simple integer version number of meta model.
        Throws:
        PropertyNotPresentException - The optional root format version property is not present for this root.

      • setRootFormatVersion

        void setRootFormatVersion(@UInt32
                          Integer rootFormatVerison)
                   throws IllegalArgumentException

        Sets the simple integer version number of meta model. If present, this optional property shall be 12h or greater.

        Parameters:
        rootFormatVerison - Simple integer version number of meta model.
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - Cannot set the root format version to a value less than 12h (18).

      • clone

        Root clone()

        Create a cloned copy of this root.

        Returns:
        Cloned copy of this root.
